actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gnoll makes one Bite attack and two Battleaxe attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Harrying Attacks
special_abilities.desc: If the gnoll attacks more than one creature in the same turn, the first target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
